name: The Demon Within
description:
Welcome to the demon's lair, his dwelling. How did you get here? How will you escape? CAN you escape? Try your best, it's easier said then done... Game Content

• 34 Different Items 

 • 7 Item Types 

 • A Grim, Dark Little Story 

 • Many Challenging Floors 

 • 10 Different Enemies

NPC’s

There are npc's in the game. Bump into them to talk with them!

 

Overall Score System

Simply put, it will either raise or lower your score counter based on certain feats (i.e. striking enemies and evading enemies, etc.) and certain mistakes (i.e. receiving enemy strikes, etc.)

 

Interact-able Objects

Most objects that aren't the wall are interactable! Find out what they all do!

 

Game Strategy

This game is challenging and you may find yourself overwhelmed in the early game. There is a way around this! Try to look for the next floors' stairs first. then hunt down chests. If you run into a lot of enemies, you'll have a clear path of escape if you need it!

Sometimes you will run into a situation where you need to attack first. if you run across some objects on the floors. Bump into them to burn a turn so you can attack first!

 

Additional Info

there are plenty of secrets to uncover and a grim story to be told! Have fun! If you're proud of your end game stats then post a screenshot or share your overall score in the comments! I poured my heart and soul into this game I'm glad I can share it with y'all! Enjoy!

Known Issues

• Wall Tile Generation Bug:

• Trapped Room Bug: A very rare bug wherein the wall tiles prevent you from leaving a floor's first generated room. (reported twice from (1) playtester, and personally witnessed once during the 6 month development time)
